title: Tech Talks
description: A responsive mobile first full stack app made with the TDD technique using: React/Redux, Ruby on Rails, Webpacker, Sass, Bootstrap, RSpec and Capybara.

title: Bookstore
description: A Bookstore app built with ReactJS and Redux implementing the CRUD actions and the functionality to store and filter books by category.

title: Battleship
description: The old school battleship game created with the TDD technique using Jest and vanilla JavaScript, ES6 modules, Webpack, Babel, HTML5 and CSS3.

title: To-do List
description: To-do list app build with vanilla JavaScript, ES6 Modules, Webpack, HTML5 and CSS3 using CRUD actions to control the to-dos and using the Local Storage for saving.
